graph_title: Level of national compliance with labour rights (freedom of association and collective bargaining) based on International Labour Organization (ILO) textual sources and national legislation, by sex and migrant status

SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment
